nodes.documentation:
@title ChronoMintCrowdsale contract
 Accepts Ether and ERC20 tokens.
nodes.name: ChronoMintCrowdsale

nodes.documentation: Checks if ERC20 sale is enabled for gined token.
nodes.name: isERC20Sale

nodes.documentation: Check if Ether sale is enabled.
nodes.name: isEtherSale
ChronoMintCrowdsale

nodes.documentation: Enable Ether sale
nodes.name: enableEtherSale

nodes.documentation: Disable Ether sale
nodes.name: disableEtherSale

nodes.documentation: Allow to receive ERC20 token with given symbols.
nodes.name: enableERC20Sale

nodes.documentation: Deny to receive ERC20 token with given symbols.
nodes.name: disableERC20Sale

nodes.documentation:
The basic entry point to participate the crowdsale process.
Pay for funding, get invested tokens back in the sender address.
    * Ether sale must be enabled.

Investors can claim refund (only Ether deposit).
    * Note that any refunds from proxy buyers should be handled separately,
and not through this contract.
nodes.name: refund

nodes.documentation:
@dev Receive ERC20 Token and send bounty.
    * ERC20 sale must be enabled to token with given symbol.
nodes.name: sellERC20

nodes.documentation:
Investors can claim refund (only ERC20 deposit).
    * Note that any refunds from proxy buyers should be handled separately,
and not through this contract.
nodes.name: refundERC20

nodes.documentation: @dev Withdrawal Ether balance on successfull finish
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation: Returns token symbol by given address.
nodes.name: getTokenSymbol
